jobDescription: We are seeking a Project Manager for our Interior Construction team with a strong work ethic and the ability to work in a fast paced environment. This position will be responsible for specialized projects utilizing our full height wall product to include coordination of projects throughout their life cycle. Responsibilities include taking field measurements and installation layout, quoting installation labor, planning and scheduling manpower, supervising installation crew on site, reviewing shop drawings, documenting changes to project and overall coordination for the entire project life cycle, and attending construction meetings engaging in a high level of client interaction with all the trades. Must be able to organize and lead a team to successful completion of a project. Job may require occasional travel, nights and/or weekends. Required Experience, Skills, and Education:4 year college degree preferred1 – 3 + years of relevant work experience, construction field experience preferredGood written and verbal communication skillsGood interpersonal skills to interact effectively with a wide range of people both within and outside of the companyExceptional organizational skills to handle a high volume of detailed work and the ability to multitaskGood problem solving, math and analytical skillsProficient in Microsoft Office with Microsoft project and AutoCAD experience preferred
